entry.title: CyclePlus Recumbent Bike with Arm Exercise
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> CyclePlus

 Click the Play Button Above to View the CyclePlus Product Overview Video




Ideal for All Age Groups

User Height Range

 4'11" to 6'4"

 Max User Weight

400 lbs

Total Body Workout

 

Dual action recumbent bike with arm motion provides users with a total body workout. 

 

Walk Through Design

 Unobstructed walk through frame design allows even the most deconditioned users to easily enter the CyclePlus. 

 

Wide Cushioned Seat

The CyclePlus has a 17" wide padded seat pad and contoured seat back to make your extended workouts more comfortable. 

The easy adjust knob allows users to stay seated and quickly adjust the seat position. 


CyclePlus Seat Dimensions 

Adjustable Pedal Straps

Extra wide textured non-slip foot pedals with adjustable straps ensure safety and comfort during your workout. 

Heart Rate Programs

Built-in contact heart rate and heart rate control programs.

Essential to all rehabilitation exercises, the CyclePlus features contact heart rate in the handle of the machine. Your heart rate is clearly displayed on the screen so you can track your health and fitness goals.

Water Bottle Holder

Easy to reach water bottle holder connected to the seat handles. 


Interactive Training

The CyclePlus is compatible with Kinomap and other virtual training apps to help keep you motivated during your workouts. Requires your own tablet or smart phone and additional subscriptions. 

Large and Intuitive Display

The CyclePlus has a 7" LCD display with 25 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button for manual training. 

Integrated media shelf adjusts to hold tablets and phones. 


Optional Ortho Pedals

Add additional comfort and security to the CyclePlus by purchasing the optional Ortho Heel Cups.

Add to your order for $100 

$200 Value, Order Now and Save 

Use the dropdown menu at the top of this page to select the option to add Ortho Pedals to your CyclePlus.

Compact Design

The sleek design of the CyclePlus is only 24" wide ideal for fitting in a spare bedroom or in a corner of the living room. 

63" Long x 24" Wide

Transport Wheels

Conveniently move the CyclePlus with the transport wheels.  

Self Powered or Plug In

The CyclePlus can either be plugged in to a standard wall outlet or if there is not an outlet nearby, you can use it without the plug, activating the internal generator system.

Burn Calories

Engage your upper and lower body to burn more calories than on a traditional recumbent bike. 

Family Owned & Operated

HealthCare International is proud to be one of the longest standing family owned and operated fitness equipment manufacturers based in the USA!

Buy American Act

LIGHT COMMERCIAL WARRANTY

1 Year Labor

Controlled RPM recovery training.

entry.title: CardioStep Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 2995.00 - 3295.00 (2 variants)

SKU: Hci-Fitness-CS-600

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> CardioStep

  **In-Stock Ready to Ship**

 

2021 Updates : Swivel Seat - Commercial Grade Display - 32 Levels of Resistance

CardioStep Recumbent Semi-Elliptical Cross Trainer provides an easy & effective total body cardio workout. The semi-recumbent sitting position combines stability and comfort with the smooth and natural feel of an elliptical. The semi-elliptical motion allows for natural biomechanics with zero impact to the user’s joints.  The unique, ascending arm motion provides bilinear resistance with ergonomic, rotating hand grips. Users can target different muscle groups by rotating the handle position to different angles.

  The CardioStep has a large seat that swivels to either side and a low 9” step through height that makes it easy for all fitness levels to transfer on and off the machine. The 20” wide memory foam seat offers comfort and stability while using the CardioStep.  In addition, the seat back has 3 reclining angles that the user can select.

 Featuring a 9” LCD display with 32 levels of resistance and 19 workout programs the CardioStep Recumbent Semi-Elliptical Cross Trainer is designed for a wide range of users.  The CardioStep also includes contact heart rate on the seat handles and heart rate controlled workout programs.  The display workout data shows Time, Distance, Steps per Minute, WATTs, METs, Total Steps, Pulse, and the Resistance Level.  When you are done with your workout, download your workout report to a USB allowing users to track their progress and share their results.

 The CardioStep Recumbent Semi-Elliptical Cross Trainer is rated for full commercial use and is backed by an industry leading parts and labor warranty. Built with high quality commercial components and available at an affordable price the CardioStep Recumbent Semi-Elliptical Cross Trainer is perfect for commercial, medical, rehabilitation or home applications.

New Upgraded Display

User Height Range

 4'9" to 6'2"

Max User Weight

450 lbs

Semi-Elliptical Motion

 10" Stride Length

Low Impact Semi-Elliptical  Contralateral Arm and Leg Motion. 

Swivel Seat

360° Swivel Seat for entrance from the left or right side.

Having a swivel seat on your recumbent cross trainer not only makes it easier to get on and off the machine, it also protects your investment ensuring that you will be able to continue to use your CardioStep for years to come.

Heart Rate Programs

Built-in contact heart rate and heart rate control programs.

Essential to all rehabilitation exercises, the CardioStep features heart rate sensors in the handle of the machine. Your heart rate is clearly displayed on the screen so you can track your health and fitness goals.

Large and Intuitive Display

The CardioStep has a 9" LCD display with 19 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button. 

With 32 levels of electronic resistance, the CardioStep's resistance can be adjusted with a touch of a button.  The CardioStep has a low starting resistance and manageable increments allowing users to gradually increase resistance. 

View More Images

Optional Arm Rest Kit

Add comfort and security to the CardioStep by purchasing the optional folding arm rest kit.

entry.title: VersaStep Recumbent Elliptical Ipsilateral Cross Trainer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 3395.00 - 3595.00 (2 variants)

SKU: Hci-Fitness-VSX

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> VersaStep

Learn More about Shipping and White Glove Assembly Options

 **In -Stock Ready to Ship **


Ipsilateral Training is a side to side motion that connects your left arm and left leg / right arm and right leg. Ispilateral movement increases stability requirements during your workout and trains your body to react to off setting forces that can cause a fall or injury.

The side to side Ipsilateral movement challenges your body to move in a new way, activating different muscle groups that help promote greater balance and coordination.

 The leg motion is a true 12" elliptical stride motion and the connected arms are doing a punching motion. 

Did we mention you get all these benefits from a safe and comfortable seated position?

 

The The VeraStep Recumbent Ellipical with Ipsilateral side to side cross training motion is different than any other Recumbent Cross Trainer on the market!

The ipsilateral motion provides a low impact cardio workout that engages users to activate different muscle groups than traditional contra-lateral cross trainers. By combining Ipsilateral movement in a seated position the VersaStep challenges user balance and coordination while in a safe and comfortable seated position.

The VersaStep's contoured memory foam seat reclines to accommodate users up to 6'4" with a 500 lb weight capacity. The over sized seat also swivels for easy access on and off the machine from either side.

The VersaStep is the only piece of equipment on the market that offers the balance and coordination benefits of total body Ipsilateral training in a stable and comfortable seated position.

Equipped with contact heart rate, 32 levels of resistance, 20 workout programs, and backed by a lifetime commercial frame warranty: the VersaStep is the ideal piece of equipment to add to your commercial facility or home gym.

Max User Weight

500 lbs

entry.title: PhysioStep HXT Compact Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 2195.00 - 2395.00 (2 variants)


SKU: Hci-Fitness-HXT-300

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> PhysioStep HXT

Learn More about Shipping and White Glove Assembly Options


**In-Stock Ready to Ship**

Optional Assembly and Install Available at Check Out

 

Click the Play Button Above to View the PhysioStep HXT Product Overview Video

Compact Home Cardio Machine

The PhysioStep HXT compact semi-elliptical recumbent cross trainer provides an easy & effective total body cardio workout for all ages. The PhysioStep HXT is our most compact and affordable recumbent cross trainer and has a semi-elliptical motion with minimum extension - 8" elliptical stride.

The PhysioStep HXT features a step through design and a low entry seat. Users will enjoy the unique rotating hand grips and quick release lever that allows for hand positioning at any angle.  The PhysioStep HXT recumbent cross trainer has a shorter arm movement that will not strain your shoulders while still engaging the upper body.

Designed for light commercial or home use the PhysioStep HXT is a compact and affordable recumbent cross trainer  that is ideal for any space. The PhysioStep HXT is smooth and quiet during operation so it can even be used in a TV room or bedroom. 

Powered by AC plug into a standard wall outlet,  the PhysioStep HXT is designed to be used at low speeds for rehabilitation and can provide strong resistance for a challenging workout. The machine is also power saving and will automatically shut off after 5 minutes of inactivity. The backlight LCD display provides all your workout information in a clear and easy to read format so you can track your fitness goals.

 

Ideal for All Ages

User Height Range

 4'9" to 6'2"

Max User Weight

330 lbs


Click the Play Button Above to View the PhysioStep HXT Pedaling Motion

 The pedaling motion is a compact oval shape.

HCI Fitness does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment

COMMERCIAL WARRANTY

3 Year Parts

1 Year Labor

Lifetime on the Frame

 ABOUT HCI FITNESS

 

The all new PhysioStep PRO Recumbent Stepper Cross Trainer is the newest addition to HCI Fitness’ commercial line of rehabilitation exercise equipment.

Combining a smooth linear stepping motion with the benefits of a total body workout in a comfortable seated position, the PhysioStep PRO is one of the most versatile rehabilitation products on the market.

Whether in a cardiac rehab or physical therapy setting, the open walk through design and step lock feature makes entering the PhysioStep PRO safe and easy.

The PhysioStep PRO's unique arm-to-leg motion allows users to exercise in a variety of low impact total body workouts. For focused rehabilitation, the user can isolate the operation of the unit to the left or right side. Those seeking a more intense total body workout strength training workout can use the PhysioStep Pro in a seated rowing or leg press motion.

Simply by moving the PhysioStep PRO's seat and handlebar lengths, the degree of knee and hip flexion can be adjusted to fit specific patients’ needs. The further back the patient sits, the less flexion in their step. Finding the correct exercising position is critical to patients’ success, allowing them to perform rehabilitation exercises for a longer period.

The PhysioStep PRO features an over sized 20” wide swivel seat, making patient transfers on and off the unit less strenuous. In addition, the swivel seat can easily slide off to accommodate patients in wheelchairs.

The PhysioStep PRO has a large 9” color-coded console that displays all your important workout information in a clear and easy to read format. The low 6 WATT starting resistance and 16 levels of electronically controlled resistance make the PhysioStep PRO adaptable to all functional levels. Users can choose from 18 workout programs including target, variable and constant workload programs.

Using the USB Report function workout data can be easily exported via USB for tracking patient goals in excel. The workout report records important totals, averages and peaks of workout feedback including WATTs and METs.

Paired with the PhysioStep Stabilization Accessories Kit, patients can secure their legs, hands, and torso with optional bi-lateral leg stabilizers, grip gloves, and retractable seat belt.

The PhysioStep PRO recumbent stepper cross trainer is perfect to fit your active aging, fitness, wellness and Long-Term Care needs from rehabilitation to senior living.

 

↑Click the prequalify link at the top of the page above the price.

Swivel Seat

360° Swivel Seat for entrance from the left or right side. Transition grab handle for added user support. 

Having a swivel seat on your recumbent cross trainer not only makes it easier to get on and off the machine, it also protects your investment ensuring that you will be able to continue to use your PhysioStep MDX for years to come.

500lb User Capacity

Highest Weight Limit in its category. The PhysioStep MDX made with high quality hardened steel.

5'0" to 6'5"

Large and Intuitive Display

The PhysioStep MDX has a 9" LCD display with 20 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button. 

With 32 levels of electronic resistance, the PhysioStep MDX's resistance can be adjusted with a touch of a button.  The PhysioStep MDX has a low starting resistance and manageable increments allowing users to gradually increase resistance. 

Family Owned & Operated

HCI Fitness does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment

It's Time to Start Moving Today!

The PhysioStep MDX – Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer gives you an easy & effective low – impact total body cardio workout and combines a stable & stress free recumbent sitting position, with the smooth and natural feeling of an elliptical. The innovative elliptical stride is incredibly smooth and easy on your joints.


Whether it is for weight loss, general health improvement, cardiac rehabilitation, corporate wellness or transitioning from Physical Therapy to Home Exercise, the PhysioStep MDX Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer is the ideal piece of equipment to get you moving!


The PhysioStep MDX Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer features a large, over sized comfortable swivel seat that adjusts easily and rotates 360 degrees making this unit the most accessible for people with low mobility. Other features include a low profile walk – through design and ergo – grip handles to work your arm and core muscles. The fully adjustable arms, seat, and seat back accommodate a wide range of users.


The PhysioStep MDX Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer needs to be plugged into an electrical outlet which will then power the display unit. This benefits the de-conditioned and users with special needs. The large 9" LCD display provides all your workout information in a clear and easy to read format. The PhysioStep MDX Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer is designed to benefit a wide range of users from the physically fit to the physically challenged. Built with high quality commercial components and available at an affordable price.

 

White Glove Assembly

entry.title: PhysioTrainer CXT - Fully Assembled - Recumbent Cross Trainer for Seniors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type: Recumbent Cross Trainer
Price: 1495.00

SKU: Hci-Fitness-PT-CXT

Products -> Recumbent Cross Trainers -> PhysioTrainer CXT

**In -Stock Ready to Ship **

Click the Play Button Above to View the PhysioTrainer CXT Product Overview Video

Start Moving Today!

Low impact total body cardio workout in your own home! The PhysioTrainer CXT recumbent cross trainer is a high quality and affordable in-home physical therapy solution designed specifically for seniors and the Active Aging population. Enjoy a low impact total body cardio workout in a safe and supportive seated position from the comfort of your own home! The synchronized arm and leg cycling motion is ergonomic and safe for your knees, hips and back while burning more calories than on a standard recumbent cycle. The PhysioTrainer CXT is fun to use!  Compact dimensions - 4.5- 5  feet long by 2 feet wide!

The tension resistance System is whisper quiet, so users can watch TV while exercising without straining to hear your favorite program. More than just a recumbent cross trainer, the PhysioTrainer CXT comes with built-in multi-function resistance bands for strength and flexibility training. Whether you are recovering from an injury or looking to tone muscle The built-in resistance bands can be used to help reach your goal. Choose from numerous resistance band workouts just like in physical therapy.

The PhysioTrainer CXT recumbent cross trainer comes fully assembled with convenient "open and ride" packaging so you can workout in seconds from opening the box. Simply remove the outer packaging and wheel the unit into your room of choice. No tools or complicated assembly instructions to slow you down on your road to a healthier you! 

We are located in Washington State where we design and distribute our products with pride!

 

User Height Range

300 lbs

Tension knob allows you to easily select between levels 1 -8. The PhysioTrainer CXT starts at a low easy resistance and becomes a challenging workout as you increase the resistance. 

Cycling Motion 

The PhysioTrainer CXT has a true recumbent cycle pedaling motion for your legs.

 

Interested in a Linear Stepping Motion?

 

Total Body Workout 

Recumbent cycling motion for your lower body and a upward reaching motion for your upper body combine for a low impact total body workout.

Advanced Physical Therapy Equipment at Home

The PhysioStep LXT clearly shows your workout information and on the large and easy to read display. The PhysioStep LXT display has 20 programs and a Quick Start button. 

  The display shows your workout Time, Distance, Calories, Pulse, Speed, Total Steps, Steps per Minute, Resistance Level, WATTs and METS. With all of your workout information on one screen you can easily keep your goals in sight!

450 lbs

Linear Motion

 

Natural 2 to 1 Contralateral Arm and Leg Linear Stepping Motion. Just like in Physical Therapy.

Swivel Seat

360° Swivel Seat for entrance from the left or right side. Easy to reach swivel seat lever on side of seat.

Having a swivel seat on your recumbent cross trainer not only makes it easier to get on and off the machine, it also protects your investment ensuring that you will be able to continue to use your PhysioStep LXT for years to come.

Oversized 20" Seat Base

The PhysioStep LXT has our largest and most comfortable seat. The 4" thick and 20" wide memory foam seat base provides premium comfort.

Large Foot Pedals

The PhysioStep LXT has large foot pedals with 4" heel cups to help support your foot. The included ankle and foot strap add additional support to keep you feet in the pedals. 

Lock in Place Swivel Tension Handles

Select any angle and lock your handles in place to work different muscle groups. 

Reclining Seat Back

Select from 3 different recline angles for the seat back position. 

Heart Rate Programs

Built-in contact heart rate and heart rate control programs.

Essential to all rehabilitation exercises, the PhysioStep LXT features heart rate sensors in the handle of the machine. Your heart rate is clearly displayed on the screen so you can track your health and fitness goals.

Large and Intuitive Display

The PhysioStep LXT has a 9" LCD display with 20 Programs and a easy QuickStart Button. 

With 32 levels of electronic resistance, the PhysioStep LXT's resistance can be adjusted with a touch of a button.  The PhysioStep LXT has a low starting resistance and manageable increments allowing users to gradually increase resistance.

 About HCI Fitness

It's Time to Start Moving Today!

The PhysioStep LXT – Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer was proudly designed, developed, & patented in the USA to help a diverse range of people meet their personal goals and feel good doing it!

Whether it is for weight loss, general health improvement, cardiac rehabilitation, corporate wellness or transitioning from Physical Therapy to Home Exercise, the PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer is the ideal piece of equipment to get you moving!

The PhysioStep LXT recumbent linear stepping motion gives you an easy and effective low impact total body workout. It combines a stable and stress free recumbent sitting position, with the natural feeling of walking. The innovative Linear Stepping Motion is incredibly smooth and easy on your joints.

The PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer has a large, over sized “ultra comfortable” swivel seat that adjusts easily and fully rotates making this unit easily accessible for people with low mobility. Other features include a low profile walk through design & ergo grip handles to work your arm and core muscles. The fully adjustable arms, seat, and seat back accommodate a wide range of users.

The large 9" LCD display provides all your workout information in a clear and easy to read format. Built with high quality commercial components and available at an affordable price the PhysioStep LXT Recumbent Linear Cross Trainer is perfect for commercial, medical, rehabilitation or home applications.
